TopicTitle: (Resolved) Is there somewhere on the screen that shows what a manoeuvre node is going to do ?

Articles.Content:
It's awkward to circularise an orbit when I can only zoom out and eyeball the manoeuvre into something that looks like a circle then suck it and see, I'm slowly finding where things are shown on the screen but I haven't managed to find anything yet that tells me what periapsis / apoapsis I'm going to end up with after a burn. Am I not seeing it or is it not there ?

edit - I can get the orbits quite circular enough (e.g. within 100m around Kerbin) by dialing the engine down to 10% and slow burning in the right direction, it would just be nice to not have to.

edit2 - mods for the win. Spacewarp, Sticky Orbit Markers, and Maneuver Node Controller for the win !

Cheers

Edited March 1, 2023 by Chairman
